channel.title: I Get This Error When I teleport on the full screen and i get frozen screen,help
channel.description: Exception in thread "Thread-5" java.lang.NullPointerException at RSApplet.switchToNormalscreen(RSApplet.java:51) at client.doAction(client.java:5929) at client.processMenuClick(client.java:1898) at client.mainGameProcessor(client.java:5242) at client.processGameLoop(client.java:4194) at RSApplet.run(RSApplet.java:174) at client.run(client.java:7195) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) I really appriciate it :) add me on skype: george.haddad1999 :)

item.title: I Get This Error When I teleport on the full screen and i get frozen screen,help
item.dc:creator: @georgehaddad georgehaddad
item.description:
@georgehaddad wrote:

Exception in thread “Thread-5” java.lang.NullPointerException
at RSApplet.switchToNormalscreen(RSApplet.java:51)
at client.doAction(client.java:5929)
at client.processMenuClick(client.java:1898)
at client.mainGameProcessor(client.java:5242)
at client.processGameLoop(client.java:4194)
at RSApplet.run(RSApplet.java:174)
at client.run(client.java:7195)
at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)
I really appriciate it
add me on skype: george.haddad1999
